parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration in the steering wheel can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Vibration felt through the steering wheel

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering axle can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Steer Tire Wear and Alignment Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature wear on steer tires can lead to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities. Alignment issues can exacerbate tire wear, further increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Uneven or rapid wear on steer tires
pulling to one side while driving

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure, including blowouts and breaks, can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially at high speeds.
The failure of the drive axle can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to surrounding components, which can lead to costly repairs and potentially harm occupants.
symptoms: unusual noises from the axle area
